requirements.summary: Configure the publish/deployment domain slug to the valid value "ip-look-up" without changing user-facing UI text.
acceptanceCriteria: The configured publish/deployment domain is exactly "ip-look-up".
A publish/deploy attempt no longer fails with the domain validation error about invalid characters/length.
No user-facing UI text is changed as part of this fix.

file_operations.description: Add/update a non-user-facing publish/deployment slug configuration entry so the platform uses the exact domain "ip-look-up" (e.g., via a dedicated meta/config tag consumed by the publish pipeline), without changing visible page content such as the <title> text.
